name: Random Place
content:
When you need to create a new place and are at a loss, roll one up. First, roll 1d12 for the place name template. Then, roll for each component of that template until you have a complete name. Rewrite or re-roll any result you don’t like.

 

D12 Place Name Template
1-2 The @RollTable[KsVeMb9gqz8KcX4s]{Random Place - Place}
3-4 The @RollTable[4QVEEly7HlaQmpLO]{Random Place - Adjective} @RollTable[KsVeMb9gqz8KcX4s]{Random Place - Place}
5-6 The @RollTable[KsVeMb9gqz8KcX4s]{Random Place - Place} of (the) @RollTable[eJhVGEm9yck9XJVK]{Random Place - Noun}
7-8 (The) @RollTable[eJhVGEm9yck9XJVK]{Random Place - Noun}’s @RollTable[KsVeMb9gqz8KcX4s]{Random Place - Place}
9-10 @RollTable[KsVeMb9gqz8KcX4s]{Random Place - Place} of the @RollTable[4QVEEly7HlaQmpLO]{Random Place - Adjective} @RollTable[eJhVGEm9yck9XJVK]{Random Place - Noun}
11-12 The @RollTable[4QVEEly7HlaQmpLO]{Random Place - Adjective} @RollTable[eJhVGEm9yck9XJVK]{Random Place - Noun}
